titles.title: Counterfeiting and Money Laundering Deterrence Act of 1994
A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to design and issue new counterfeit-resistant $100 currency.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6408-6409)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/25/1994--Introduced. Counterfeiting and Money Laundering Deterrence Act of 1994 - Amends Federal monetary law to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to design and designate a counterfeit-resistant domestic use $100 denomination bill which shall be exchanged for existing currency according to prescribed guidelines.
